value.title: The Crunchbase Tech Layoffs Tracker
value.content: Over 127,000 workers at U.S.-based tech companies were laid off in mass job cuts in 2025, per a Crunchbase News tally, and the layoffs have continued into 2026. See the latest companies to cut roles.

value.title: A Growing Share Of Seed And Series A Funding Is Going To Giant Rounds
value.content: A dynamic we’re seeing more of at seed and Series A is the number of unusually large rounds that has been creeping up in recent quarters.

value.title: Northwood Space Raises $100M Series B And Lands $50M Government Contract As Space Tech Funding Rockets Higher
value.content: Northwood Space, which builds infrastructure that lets satellites communicate with Earth, announced Tuesday that it has raised $100 million in a Series B funding round.

value.title: Beyond The Buzz: AI’s Real Impact And Illusions We Must Avoid
value.content: AI is not a standalone sector. It is an infrastructure layer, just like the internet once was, and it's being embedded across every industry, writes Crunchbase News columnist and startup adviser Itay Sagie, who points out that artificial intelligence is not stealing the spotlight from other sectors; it's powering them.

value.title: SpaceX Vaults To Top Of The List As 23 Companies Join Unicorn Board In December
value.content: The momentum of new unicorn creation picked up in the final four months of 2025, with the fourth quarter showing the highest count of newly minted billion–dollar-plus valued companies since Q2 2022.

value.title: AI Lab Ricursive Intelligence Lands $300M Series A At $4B Valuation Less than Two Months After Launch
value.content: Ricursive Intelligence, a frontier AI lab, announced on Monday that it has raised $300 million in a Series A round of funding at a $4 billion valuation just two months after the Palo Alto, California-based company’s launch.

value.title: Exclusive: Zocks Raises $45M Series B From Lightspeed, QED For AI Assistant To Financial Advisers
value.content: Zocks, a builder of an AI assistant for financial advisers, has raised $45 million in a Series B funding co-led by Lightspeed Venture Partners and QED Investors, the startup told Crunchbase News exclusively.

value.title: The Week’s 10 Biggest Funding Rounds: A Big Week For AI And Drone Delivery
value.content: Venture investors' thirst for AI isn’t close to quenched yet. That’s the takeaway from this week’s lineup of large U.S. funding rounds, which was mostly a mix of AI pure-plays and companies with a heavy focus on the technology.

value.title: Capital One To Buy Fintech Startup Brex At Less Than Half Its Peak Valuation In $5.15B Deal
value.content: Banking giant Capital One announced on Thursday that it is acquiring fintech startup Brex for $5.15 billion in a cash and stock deal, in what Brex claims would represent “the largest bank-fintech deal in history.”

value.title: Exclusive: Cambio Lands $18M At $100M Valuation For AI-Powered Commercial Real Estate Software
value.content: The startup, which has built AI-powered commercial real estate software for institutional investors, has raised $18 million in a Series A round at a $100 million valuation.
